product_name: The North Face Lenox Down Peacoat - Men's
long_description: The North Face Lenox Down peacoat isn't your dad's old peacoat. The Lenox is waterproof and breathable to shed rain and snow, while lofty down insulation throughout provides warmth when it's cold. HyVent(R) 2-layer construction offers waterproof, breathable, seam-sealed protection; performance lining wicks moisture from body to keep you warm and dry on the inside. Jacket is insulated with quality 700-fill-power goose down for warmth, light weight and compressibility. Double-breasted button-closure placket covers a center front zipper. Button-up collar and stretchy internal cuffs seal in warmth. Back pleat with snap closure. The North Face Lenox Down peacoat has welted hand pockets and an internal chest pocket.
short_description: The North Face Lenox Down peacoat isn't your dad's old peacoat. The Lenox is waterproof and breathable to shed rain and snow, while lofty down insulation throughout provides warmth when it's cold.
